subject: AI & Agents
title: Named Entity Recognition: Finding Names and Dates
description: One-minute skill: Named Entity Recognition: Finding Names and Dates.

hook.text: 'Apple released the iPhone 16 on September 20.' NER finds Apple, iPhone 16, and the date.

buildup.text: NER identifies and classifies entities: people, organizations, locations, dates, amounts.

discovery.text: Token-level classification: each word gets a label (B-ORG, I-ORG, O) using BIO tagging.

twist.text: Ambiguity is everywhere: 'Apple' could be a company, a fruit, or a person's name.

climax.text: NER is the first step in knowledge graphs, search indexing, and document processing.

punchline.text: Find the who, what, where, and when.

quiz.question: What does NER identify in text?
options: Named entities like people, organizations, and dates
